_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The actions of the monk who enters the v: Enters the village or town for alms
Without guarding body, speech, and mind
The consequences of the actions of the m: Sees a female scantily clad, with revealing clothes
Results in death or deadly pain
The training that the mendicants should: Enter the village or town for alms guarding body, speech, and mind
